how_to_donate_step1: <1>Connect your Ethereum wallet</1> (MetaMask or other compatible).
how_to_donate_step2: <1>Choose the amount</1> you want to donate in our digital currency.
how_to_donate_step4: <1>Track the impact</1> of your donation in real time!
about_paragraph: <1>VibeChain</1> is a <2>transparent</2> and <3>secure</3> donation platform for children with cancer, using Ethereum blockchain technology. Our goal is to ensure every donation is traceable, auditable, and reaches the right destination, fostering trust and real impact.
title: Donate joyfully. Impact real lives.
subtitle: Introducing VibeChain, a revolutionary blockchain-based project dedicated to supporting children with cancer. Through donations in our digital currency, we unite technology and solidarity to spread positive messages and hope. Be part of this chain of good and make a difference in many children's lives. Your donation transforms and vibrates with love and solidarity.
cofre_balance_desc: This is the total balance available in the current vault for donations to children. Transparency guaranteed via blockchain.
donate_desc: Donate any amount in ETH and help transform lives. Your donation is recorded on the blockchain!
impact_children_desc: We have already impacted more than 120 children with direct donations.
impact_donations_desc: Total transparency: every cent is traceable on the blockchain.
impact_projects_desc: We support hospitals, events, and awareness campaigns.
impact_volunteers_desc: A growing network of good people supporting the cause.
